roleset.name: express emotion
roleset.note: EMOTE-V NOTES: Back-formation from emotion. Not really a verb, in other words. (from emote.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Sen. Kennedy, never mind his dubious credentials for the moral high ground, emoted brilliantly.

roleset.name: having strong emotions
roleset.note: EMOTIONAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WSJ data, emote.01 (from emotional.01-j)

example.name: arg0
example.text: The reaction in the newsroom was emotional .

example.name: animate arg0
example.text: Luongo: 'I was emotional and I said what I said'
